== Pilicode (CT) (627171) ==

Pilicode (CT) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 7.13 sq. km. and harbouring 2318 households with total population of 9676 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 57 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 574 km. Male population is 4600 and female population is 5076. Scheduled Caste population is 475 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3. Census Location Code of the town is 627171<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 17 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 147 km. Railway station is at Chandera at a distance of 3 km.
